# Unarmed Combat Training (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Unarmed Combat Training:* A ninja who selects this ninja trick gains [[Improved Unarmed Strike (Feat)|Improved Unarmed Strike]] as a bonus feat.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 16
